'''''Humidicutis marginata''''' is a [[Agaricales|gilled]] [[fungus]] of the [[Hygrophoraceae|waxcap]] family.

==Taxonomy==
The species was first described as ''Hygrophorus marginatus'' by [[Charles Horton Peck]] in 1876.<ref name=Peck1876/> [[William Alphonso Murrill]] called it ''Hygrocybe marginata'' in 1916.<ref name=Murrill1916/> It was transferred to the new genus ''[[Humidicutis]]'' by [[Rolf Singer]] in 1958,<ref name=Singer1958/> who had previously placed it in ''[[Tricholoma]]''.<ref name=Singer1943/>
